H0.text: Who won the 2007 Nobel Peace Prize for his environmental work including the controversial film An Inconvenient Truth. Leonardo DiCaprio

H1.text: Who won the 2007 Nobel Peace Prize for his environmental work including the controversial film An Inconvenient Truth. James Hansen

H2.text: Who won the 2007 Nobel Peace Prize for his environmental work including the controversial film An Inconvenient Truth. James Lovelock

H3.text: Who won the 2007 Nobel Peace Prize for his environmental work including the controversial film An Inconvenient Truth. Algore

A4.text: Gore is the recipient of a number of awards, including the Nobel Peace Prize (together with the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change) in 2007.
